title: Confusing naming of reads, read_files etc.
body: In this repository, terminology around reads, read files, individuals and other is often misused, making the code more complicated to understand.

title: Wrong individual names in merged vcf file
body: After merging, the vcf file still contains the full path to the individual vcf files, not the names that have been replaced in the individual vcf files. Another rename is necessary after merging.

title: Make users specify R1 and R2
body: Remake the individuals.txt file such that there is an additional column for R2, eliminating the need of matching fastq files by first read id and allowing for a better naming of temporary trimmed fastq files.

title: Add consensus fasta generation
body: This is helpful for smaller sequences that one might want to extract from WGS. Essentially call `samtools consensus` on the bam files.
